def main():
    """Update LFX for nightly builds.

    Usage:
    update_lfx_version.py <lfx_tag>
    """
    expected_args = 2
    if len(sys.argv) != expected_args:
        print("Usage: update_lfx_version.py <lfx_tag>")
        sys.exit(1)

    lfx_tag = sys.argv[1]
    update_lfx_for_nightly(lfx_tag)
